name: UBX-LOG-BATCH
description: Batched data. This message combines position, velocity and time solution, including accuracy figures. The output of this message can be requested via UBX-LOG-RETRIEVEBATCH.

fields.name: version
fields.description: Message version (0x00 for this version)

fields.name: contentValid
fields.description: Content validity flags. Bit 0 (U:1): extraPvt - Extra PVT information is valid. The fields iTOW, tAcc, numSV, HMSL, vAcc, velN, velE, velD, sAcc, headAcc and PDOP are only valid if this flag is set. Bit 1 (U:1): extraodo - Odometer data is valid. The fields distance, totalDistance and distanceStd are only valid if this flag is set. Note: the odometer feature itself must also be enabled.

fields.name: msgCnt
fields.description: Message counter; increments for each sent UBX-LOG-BATCH message.

fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch. See section Clocks and time in the integration manual for description of navigation epoch and iTOW. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Year (UTC)

fields.name: month
fields.description: Month, range 1..12 (UTC)

fields.name: day
fields.description: Day of month, range 1..31 (UTC)

fields.name: hour
fields.description: Hour of day, range 0..23 (UTC)

fields.name: min
fields.description: Minute of hour, range 0..59 (UTC)

fields.name: sec
fields.description: Seconds of minute, range 0..60 (UTC)

fields.name: valid
fields.description: Validity flags. Bit 0 (U:1): validDate - 1 = valid UTC Date (see section Time validity in the integration manual for details). Bit 1 (U:1): validTime - 1 = valid UTC Time of Day (see section Time validity in the integration manual for details).

fields.name: tAcc
fields.description: Time accuracy estimate (UTC). Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: fracSec
fields.description: Fraction of second, range -1e9..1e9 (UTC)

fields.name: fixType
fields.description: GNSSfix Type: 0 = no fix; 2 = 2D-fix; 3 = 3D-fix

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Fix status flags. Bit 0 (U:1): gnssFixOK - 1 = valid fix (i.e within DOP & accuracy masks). Bit 1 (U:1): diffSoln - 1 = differential corrections were applied. Bits 4...2 (U:3): psmState - Power save mode state (see section Power management in the integration manual for details): 0 = PSM is not active; 1 = Enabled (an intermediate state before Acquisition state); 2 = Acquisition; 3 = Tracking; 4 = Power optimized tracking; 5 = Inactive.

fields.name: flags2
fields.description: Additional flags

fields.name: numSV
fields.description: Number of satellites used in Nav Solution. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: lon
fields.description: Longitude

fields.name: lat
fields.description: Latitude

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height above ellipsoid

fields.name: HMSL
fields.description: Height above mean sea level. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: hAcc
fields.description: Horizontal accuracy estimate

fields.name: vAcc
fields.description: Vertical accuracy estimate. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: velN
fields.description: NED north velocity. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: velE
fields.description: NED east velocity. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: velD
fields.description: NED down velocity. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: gSpeed
fields.description: Ground Speed (2-D)

fields.name: headMot
fields.description: Heading of motion (2-D)

fields.name: sAcc
fields.description: Speed accuracy estimate. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: headAcc
fields.description: Heading accuracy estimate. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: PDOP
fields.description: Position DOP. Only valid if extraPvt is set.

fields.name: reserved0
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: distance
fields.description: Ground distance since last reset. Only valid if extraodo is set.

fields.name: totalDistance
fields.description: Total cumulative ground distance. Only valid if extraodo is set.

fields.name: distanceStd
fields.description: Ground distance accuracy (1-sigma). Only valid if extraodo is set.
